inclusion.criterion: critical care patients with blood glucose concentration >180mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients and patients enrolled on other studies were excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with insulin-dependent diabetes are excluded and patients with glycated hemoglobin (glycosilated hemoglobin) >5.6% are also excluded because of the potential of underlying insulin resistance.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes, which is a significant medical issue.
